actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radios be capable of receiving both amplitude modulated (AM) and frequency modulated (FM) broadcasts.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to authorize the Federal Communications Commission to require that specified radios retailing for $15 or more be capable of receiving both amplitude modulated (AM) and frequency modulated (FM) broadcasts.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Communications Act of 1934 to require that radios be capable of receiving both amplitude modulated (AM) and frequency modulated (FM) broadcasts.
